sentences.english: Part3:the problems with china's fiscal policy on venture capital.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分论述我国风险投资财税政策存在的问题。

sentences.english: An effective policy of finance and tax is the main impetus to recycling economy.
sentences.chinese: 有效的财税政策是循环经济发展的主要推动力。

sentences.english: The government hopes to curtail public spending in the next tax year.
sentences.chinese: 政府希望在下个财税年度减少公家开支。

sentences.english: Fiscal and taxation policies were implemented to support disaster relief and post-earthquake recovery and reconstruction.
sentences.chinese: 实施支持抗震救灾和灾后恢复重建的财税政策。

sentences.english: We will deepen reform of fiscal and taxation systems.
We will continue to reform the scal and taxation systems.
sentences.chinese: 要继续推进财税体制改革。

sentences.english: We will increase fiscal and tax policy support and set up a sound system of low-rent housing.
sentences.chinese: 加大财税等政策支持，建立健全廉租房制度。

sentences.english: Welcome to the mechanism of tax distribution of forum about talking Scientific development.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎来到科学发展大家谈论坛财税分配机制板块。

sentences.english: Fiscal and tax policy is an important part of public antipoverty policy system.
sentences.chinese: 财税政策是城市反贫困公共政策体系的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: We will continue to reform the fiscal and taxation systems.
sentences.chinese: 要继续推进财税体制改革。
